page.title: 05AGRICULTURE IN WESTON
page.content: There are eleven farms in our area. At{Lannock Farm,}see slide 1,the live stock on the farm consists of 80 milkers,30 steers,25 young heifers and a young bull. The main crops are wheat and barley. They have a field of cabbages and one of potatoes,which are hand picked in the Autumn half term by children. They have 8 tractors. {Manor Farm}is rented from the estate. The tenant keeps four Jerseys which she milks by hand.She deales in cavles most of them are Freisians and Black Herefords. She has 200 chickens and 2 sheep. She goes to Hertford market. {Iron Gate Farm}at{Halls Green}is owned by the Park Estate. The farm is mainly barley and wheat. They also have a small beef herd. At{Darnall Farm}they grow wheat and make hay and silage. They have two herds of Herefords and Simmontal.
